term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - organically modified silica
term.title: organically modified silica

notes.item: Organically modified silicas can be obtained by sol-gel processing.
An organically modified silica is of general structure (RO)aSi(B)b(C)c(D)d, where (a+b+c+d)=4, R is any alkyl, aryl or heteroaryl group and B, C and D are generally organic groups.
Though it is a commonly used acronym for organically modified silica, 'Ormosil' is a trademark and as such its terminological use is discouraged.
